Name: ContentController
Description: ContentController extends BasicController and add support for obtaining generalized or typed content JSON response objects comprised of object, list and errors. A controller that does not require CRUD functionality but still need to get typed or generalized content response can benefit from ContentController.

Methods.Name: GetListResult
Methods.Description: Composes standard JSON response object based on list records and errors list.

Methods.Name: GetListResultWithException
Methods.Description: Composes standard JSON exception response object based on list records and exception information.

Methods.Name: GetListWiseResults
Methods.Description: Composes standard JSON response object based on list records, errors list, records count, list size and list number.

Methods.Name: GetObjectResult
Methods.Description: Composes standard JSON response object based on result record and errors list.

Methods.Name: GetObjectResultWithException
Methods.Description: Composes standard JSON response object based on result record and exception information.

Methods.Name: GetFlexObjectResult
Methods.Description: Composes standard JSON response object based on result record and errors list.

Methods.Name: GetFlexObjectResultWithException
Methods.Description: Composes standard JSON response object based on result record and exception information.

Additionals.Title: Important
Additionals.Description: WindnTrees for .NET platform extend native.NET controller with BasicController, ContentController and CRUDController that are useful when writing a WindnTrees application.
